pages.text: $(item)Neutron Reflectors$() reflect back $(l:ftbic:generators/nuclear/fuel#pulse)Neutron Pulses$() back to the Fuel Rod that created them.$(br2)A single Fuel Rod surrounded by 4 Neutron Reflectors will receive 4 Neutron Pulses.

Neutron Reflectors have $(c)durability$(). They lose one durability per second. $(br2)$(item)Thick Neutron Reflectors$() last 4 times longer, and $(item)Iridium Neutron Reflectors$() have unlimited durability.
